description: Roof extension to main rear roof slope; installation of one rooflight to front roof slope and one rooflight to side (north) roof slope; replacement of timber framed door to ground floor rear elevation with timber framed door; enlargement of door opening to ground floor rear elevation; removal of window opening to ground floor side (north) elevation; and insertion of window opening to ground floor side (north) elevation
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings: Site Location Plan, SO-929-01 (Existing Plans), SO-929-02 (Existing Elevations), SO-929-03 (Proposed Ground Floor), SO-929-04 REV A (Proposed Second Floor), SO-929-05 (Proposed Section A-A), SO-929-06 (Proposed Rear Elevation), SO-929-07 REV A (Proposed Elevations) and SO-929-08 (Proposed First Floor).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials, unless otherwise stated in the approved plans listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016). | The hereby approved rooflight to the front roof slope shall be a conservation style rooflight and shall lie flush with the plane of the roof.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The hereby approved side-facing rooflight to the second floor north elevation shall be conservation style and lie flush with the plane of the roof and shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), policies Local variation to policy 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
